meanings.definition: The combining of two or more companies into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The megamergers of tech giants created a new industry leader.
meanings.sent2: The megamergers in the pharmaceutical sector led to job cuts.
meanings.sent3: The megamergers of the toy companies resulted in a giant teddy bear monopoly.
meanings.sent4: The megamergers in the automotive industry reshaped the market landscape.
meanings.sent5: The concept of megamergers revolutionized the business world.

meanings.definition: The act of merging on a large scale.
meanings.sent1: The megamergers of various airlines caused ticket prices to fluctuate.
meanings.sent2: The megamergers between media companies changed the entertainment landscape.
meanings.sent3: The megamergers of fast-food chains made for some interesting menu combinations.
meanings.sent4: The megamergers in the fashion industry brought together iconic brands.
meanings.sent5: The idea of megamergers transformed the way industries operate.
